Specification.Comments: This is a sample ADT A04 message for patient registration

UseCase.Actor: Person receiving care at VHA facility
Registers or admits patient to facility and discharges or checks patient out of facility
UseCase.PreCondition: Patient previously registered or admitted to facility
UseCase.EventFlow: Patient is admitted/registered by Registration clerk
Patient is discharged from/checked out of facilty

Conformance.StaticID: {ConfSig(1) VHA(1) 2.4(7) static-profile(1) ADT(3) A04(4) null(0) ADT_A01(3) (1) Sender(1)}

Segment.Name: MSH
Segment.ImpNote: This is just a seg imp note to see if it shows ok OK?

Field.Name: Field Separator
Field.ImpNote: VA standard is ^, but is configurable via HL7 1.6 pkg

Field.Name: Encoding Characters
Field.ImpNote: This is just a seg imp note to see if it shows ok OK?

Field.Name: Event Type Code
Field.ImpNote: This is for backward comp only

Component.Name: second or further given names or initials thereof
code identifying the check digit scheme employed
code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Patient Identifier List
Field.ImpNote:
SSN - primary (0-1) Alias SSN (0-1) Primary Long ID (1) Primary Short ID (1) Integration Control Number (ICN) (1)
In VistA, the Alias names are paired with their corresponding alias identifiers (what if more alias names than alias identifiers or vv ?)

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed
code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Patient Name
Field.ImpNote:
Legal Name - primary (This is also termed the VA Standardized name) (1) Display Legal Name (0-1) Alias (0-n) Display Alias (0-n)
In VistA, the Alias names are paired with their corresponding alias identifiers (what if more alias names than alias identifiers or vv ?)

Field.Name: Mother's Maiden Name
Field.ImpNote: Not sent by HEC Not Maintained by NED

Field.Name: Patient Alias
Field.ImpNote: No longer supported. All patient names are stored in PID-5, patient name

Field.Name: Race
Field.ImpNote: HEC does not maintain this attribute

Field.Name: Patient Address
Field.ImpNote: VistA: Permanent (0-1) - always first rep Temporary (0-1) - always 2nd rep Office (0-1) - always 3rd rep

Component.Name: other designation
Component.ImpNote: Used for second address line where necessary

Component.Name: other geographic designation
Component.ImpNote: used for 3rd address line where necessary

Field.Name: County Code
Field.ImpNote: No longer supported. Use component in patient Address field

Field.Name: Phone Number - Home
Field.ImpNote: VistA: Permanent (0-1) - always 1st rep Temporary (0-1) - always 2nd rep

Field.Name: Phone Number - Business
Field.ImpNote: VistA: Work - always 1st rep Employer - always 2nd rep

Field.Name: Primary Language
Field.ImpNote: ? if this element is in VistA - seems it should be

Field.Name: Religion
Field.ImpNote: HEC does not maintain this attribute

Component.Name: name of coding system
Component.ImpNote: Should indicate standard HL7 user defined table 006

Field.Name: Patient Account Number
Field.ImpNote: Not supported by VA. ? appropriate use for VBA claim#

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed
code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Birth Place
Field.ImpNote: HEC does not maintain this attribute

Field.Name: Patient Death Indicator
Field.ImpNote: Calculated value in Vista HEC does not currently send
Field.Predicate: Valued only if PID.29 date is present

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Patient Primary Care Provider Name & ID No.

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed
code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Protection Indicator
Field.ImpNote: This needs to be fixed. CIRN has it as 0 or 1

Field.Name: Protection Indicator Effective Date
Field.ImpNote: Think we need to add this.
Field.Predicate: Must be present if PD1.12 Protection indicator is present

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Military Branch
Field.ImpNote: ? Seesm we out to support

Field.Name: Military Rank/Grade
Field.ImpNote: ? Seems we ought to support

Field.Name: Military Status
Field.ImpNote: Seems we ought to support

Field.Name: Patient Class
Field.ImpNote: O or I only (? consistent with table 0004)

Field.Name: Assigned Patient Location
Field.ImpNote: ? Seems we should value

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Prior Patient Location
Field.ImpNote: ? Should we add

Field.Name: Attending Doctor
Field.ImpNote: ? Do we provide

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Referring Doctor
Field.ImpNote: ? Do we provide

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Consulting Doctor
Field.ImpNote: ? Do we provide

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Temporary Location
Field.ImpNote: ? Do we provide

Field.Name: Admit Source
Field.ImpNote: Location of visit

Field.Name: Admitting Doctor
Field.ImpNote: ? Do we provide

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed
ID
Component.ImpNote: Pointer to entry in OUTPATIENT ENCOUNTER file This is erroneously shown as an NM in CIRN spec

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Admit Date/Time
Field.ImpNote: ? Do we value

Field.Name: Discharge Date/Time
Field.ImpNote: ? Do we value

Component.Name: code identifying the check digit scheme employed

Field.Name: Other Healthcare Provider
Field.ImpNote: ? Do we value

Component.Name: second or further given names or initials thereof
code identifying the check digit scheme employed
